name: multisig-stx-btc
description: A webscript for generating, signing, decoding multisig STX operations in the STX-over-BTC wire format

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-libs && npm run copy
scripts.distribute: npm run clean-distribute && npm run build && npm run distribute-finish
scripts.distribute-finish: cp -r dist/ webscript-multisig-stx-btc/ && zip webscript-multisig-stx-btc.zip -r webscript-multisig-stx-btc/
